channel.title: Configuration on Hugo Theme Bootstrap Docs v1
channel.description: Recent content in Configuration on Hugo Theme Bootstrap Docs v1

item.title: Multilingual Mode
item.description: HBS suppports multiple languages out of box, such as English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Russian etc.

item.title: Menu
item.description: We predefined two types of menus: main and footer, represents the top app bar menus and the footer menus, respectively. This article will briefly introduce how to use the menus.

item.title: Page Parameters
item.description: Page parameters are located in page’s Front Matter.

item.title: Site Configuration
item.description: The site configuration is located in config/_default/config.toml by default.

item.title: Site Parameters
item.description: The site parameters are located in config/_default/params.toml by default.

item.title: Configuration Structure
item.description: As the example site shown, we use Configuration Directory to maintain easier organization and environment specific settings, it is especially useful on multilingual sites.
